## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                 | Type                                     | Default  |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | -------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | Optional primary color of the alert. Use: `color="gray"`, `color="green"`, `color="yellow"`, `color="red"`. | `"gray" \| "green" \| "red" \| "yellow"` | `"gray"` |
